.. _AquaPV:

AquaPV
=================

This section give cover the AquaPV object


Creating an AquaPV Object
------------------------------

Using the path to the AquaPV module:
 1. from AquaPV import AquaPV as apv

  * Recommended
  * Creating and AquaPV object apv.AquaPV()

 2. from AquaPV import *
